title: Naruto
description: The story of a young ninja striving to become the Hokage.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy, a young pirate, embarks on a quest for the ultimate treasure.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity is on the brink of extinction after giant humanoid Titans invade their territory.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone after a failed attempt to bring their mother back to life.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players are trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG, where they must fight to survive.

title: Oshi no Ko
description: A doctor and a star idol are reborn in an unexpected way, leading to a life of fame and mystery.

title: One Punch Man
description: A hero can defeat any enemy with a single punch but struggles with the monotony of his invincible life.

title: Boku no Hero Academia
description: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers, a boy born without them fights to become a hero.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a violent encounter and must navigate the dangerous world of ghouls.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy sets out on a journey to find his father and become a Hunter, an elite class of adventurer.

title: Kimi no Na wa
description: Two teenagers share a profound connection as they mysteriously swap bodies and try to find each other.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A boy swallows a cursed object and joins a secret organization of sorcerers to defeat evil spirits.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends accidentally create a device that lets them send messages to the past, triggering unintended consequences.

title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch
description: Lelouch, a prince exiled from Britannia, gains a mysterious power and leads a rebellion against the empire.

title: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso
description: A piano prodigy, traumatized by his mother's death, rediscovers his passion for music through a free-spirited violinist.

title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
description: A boy is transported to another world where he discovers that he has the ability to return to a specific point in time every time he dies.

title: Haikyuu!!
description: A short boy with a passion for volleyball forms a team with a former rival and aims to reach the national tournament.

title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
description: A boy dies and is reincarnated into a fantasy world where he teams up with an odd group of adventurers.

title: Dr. Stone
description: In a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has been petrified, a young scientist embarks on a quest to rebuild civilization using science.

title: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute!
description: A boy obsessed with becoming the mastermind behind the shadows is reincarnated in a fantasy world where he gets the chance to live out his dream.
